SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM ,CONVERT(char(8), CONVERT(DATETIME, A.CREATE_DT),112) AS CREATE_DT ,A.USER_PASSWORD ,ISNULL(CONVERT(char(13), CONVERT(DATETIME, MAX(B.LOGIN_DATE)), 112), '접속이력 없음') AS LOGIN_DATE
,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_OLAP_USR WHERE ENABLED ='1') AS USR_COUNT ,A.RESET_PW ,A.USER_ROLE ,A.REF_DATA_ROLE ,(case when A.REF_DATA_ROLE = 'R1' then '조회' when A.REF_DATA_ROLE = 'R5' then '저장' else '권한없음' end) as REF_DATA_ROLE_TEXT FROM TB_OLAP_USR A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USR_LOG_HIST B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
AND A.ENABLED = '1' AND UPPER(A.USER_ID) LIKE '%'+UPPER(#{userId})+'%'
GROUP BY A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM, A.CREATE_DT, A.USER_PASSWORD, A.RESET_PW ,A.USER_ROLE,A.REF_DATA_ROLE ,(case when A.REF_DATA_ROLE = 'R1' then '조회' when A.REF_DATA_ROLE = 'R5' then '저장' else '권한없음' end)
SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM,A.USER_ROLE,A.REF_DATA_ROLE FROM TB_OLAP_USR A WHERE UPPER(A.USER_ID) = UPPER(#{userId}) AND A.ENABLED = '1'
